mapper.select: SELECT zldc.id, zldc.leve, zldc.leve_name, zldc.score_min, zldc.score_max, zldc.leve_des FROM zongping_leve_desc_config zldc ORDER BY zldc.id ASC

SELECT zldc.id, zldc.leve, zldc.leve_name, zldc.score_min, zldc.score_max, zldc.leve_des FROM zongping_leve_desc_config zldc WHERE zldc.score_min <= ${check_total_score} AND zldc.score_max >= ${check_total_score} ORDER BY zldc.id DESC LIMIT 1
